% Equations for relu-kernel-v1
\section{Equations: relu-kernel-v1}

\subsection{relu}
\label{eq:relu}

\begin{equation}
  y_i = max(0, x_i)
\end{equation}

\textbf{Domain:} $x \in \mathbb{R}^n$

\textbf{Codomain:} $y \in [0, âˆž)^n$

\textbf{Invariants:}
\begin{itemize}
  \item $y_i \geq 0 for all i$
  \item $relu(relu(x)) = relu(x)$
\end{itemize}
